publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2570 Michael Russell: Act of Settlementâ€”That the Parliament notes the resolution of the House of Commons on 19 December 2001 giving leave for the Introduction of a Bill by Kevin McNamara MP, and to be supported by Alex Salmond MP, which would abolish the deeply offensive anti-Catholic provisions of the Act of Settlement; congratulates the sponsors of this proposed Bill and is pleased that they have paid tribute to the Scottish Parliament for its resolution of 16 December 1999 on this matter and to the Guardian and Scotland on Sunday newspapers for actively promoting the cause for repeal; regrets that Her Majesty's Government has taken no action on this matter despite indicating general support, and renews its call for UK legislation at the earliest possible date.

S1M-2570 Michael Russell: Act of Settlement-That the Parliament notes the resolution of the House of Commons on 19 December 2001 giving leave for the Introduction of a Bill by Kevin McNamara MP, and to be supported by Alex Salmond MP, which would abolish the deeply offensive anti-Catholic provisions of the Act of Settlement; congratulates the sponsors of this proposed Bill and is pleased that they have paid tribute to the Scottish Parliament for its resolution of 16 December 1999 on this matter and to the Guardian and Scotland on Sunday newspapers for actively promoting the cause for repeal; regrets that Her Majesty's Government has taken no action on this matter despite indicating general support, and renews its call for UK legislation at the earliest possible date. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson*, Brian Adam*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2570 Act of Settlement (lodged on 20 December 2001) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-2570 Act of Settlement (lodged on 20 December 2001) Michael Matheson*, Shona Robison*, Linda Fabiani*, Tommy Sheridan*, Nora Radcliffe*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-2570 Act of Settlement (lodged on 20 December 2001) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2570 Act of Settlement (lodged on 20 December 2001) Roseanna Cunningham*, Alex Neil*
S1M-2570 Act of Settlement (lodged on 20 December 2001) Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-2570 Act of Settlement (lodged on 20 December 2001) Irene McGugan*
S1M-2570 Act of Settlement (lodged on 20 December 2001) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2570 Act of Settlement (lodged on 20 December 2001) Dennis Canavan*
S1M-2570 Act of Settlement (lodged on 20 December 2001) Fiona McLeod*, Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-2570 Act of Settlement (lodged on 20 December 2001) Donald Gorrie*
